column1: #Text=" Merchant # 1 says : " We need the shirshu spit darts !
#Text=Okay big fella , you 're gon na take a nice little snoozle .
#Text=" Merchant # 1 says : " We 've got ta get rid of this one .
#Text=" Merchant # 2 says : " We could sell it for parts .
#Text=" Trainer says : " I understand you 've had a rather hard time lately .
#Text=You probably felt you had no choice but to behave outrageously , like a wild animal .
#Text=Because I am going to break you .
#Text=Do n't worry , I 'm going to feed you too .
#Text=First , I 'm going to show you how you 'll earn it .
#Text=" Trainer says : " Of course , when you perform , the hoops will be flaming .
#Text=And if you are careful , you wo n't get burned .
#Text=It 's obvious that whoever your previous owner was , he had no idea how to handle you properly .
